title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 24
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 24
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" John Bean Technologies (JBT). John Bean Technologies Inc.'s shares rose to a record after third-quarter results were well received. The maker of food-processing systems and airport equipment extended a 4 1/2-year streak of exceeding the average analyst earnings estimate in a Bloomberg survey. Revenue also beat projections as takeovers fueled the company's growth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
